<!-- Current team member -->

Martin is a Research Software Engineer at
[ResearchIT](https://www.itservices.manchester.ac.uk/research/). His job is to
help researchers write better code, and regularly delivers an intro-to-R
workshop. He has a background in solar energy, with experience in systems
modelling, data analysis, state estimation and optimization.
